name: TARIFFUXX
author: TARIFFUXX

sections.description:
Integriere hochwertige Vergleiche oder Widgets für Mobilfunk- und DSL-Tarife in Deutschland mit dem TARIFFUXX-Plugin:
– Einfache Integration via Shortcode
– Individualisierbar (Einstellungen und Farben)
– Mehrwert für deine Besucher
– Verdiene Provisionen für Tarifvermittlungen

Weitere Informationen
– TARIFFUXX Partnerprogramm

English:
Integrate high-quality comparison tables for mobile and fixed line tariffs in Germany using TARIFFUXX-Plugin:
– Easy short code integration
– Fully customizable (settings and colors)
– Added value for visitors
– Earn commissions

Further information
– TARIFFUXX affiliate program (German only)

License

TARIFFUXX is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version.

TARIFFUXX is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with TARIFFUXX. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html.
sections.installation:
1. In deinem WordPress klicke auf Plugins >>> Installieren.
  2. Suche nach TARIFFUXX.
  3. Klicke auf den Button Jetzt installieren.
  4. Gehe zum neuen Menü TARIFFUXX Vergleiche & Widgets.
  5. Klicke auf Neu anlegen um deine erste Vergleichstabelle oder dein erstes Widget zu erstellen.

English:

  1. Visit Plugins >>> Add new within your WordPress installation.
  2. Search for TARIFFUXX.
  3. Activate TARIFFUXX by installing from your Plugins menu.
  4. Visit new TARIFFUXX Vergleiche & Widgets menu.
  5. Click Neue anlegen to add a new comparison table or widget.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Initial Release

1.1

Fixed reported bugs and extended by mobile data tariffs

1.2

Admin backend scripts/stylesheets interference bugfix and added “Mehr Tarife” Button configuration

1.3

Minor admin backend optimization and plugin test up to WP 6.1.1

1.4

Added widget cloning
Added design feature “border radius” to frames and buttons
Plugin tested up to WP 6.3.1
Minor optimization
